name: GMTK Jam: Swing Fist!
description:
Swing Fist is a game for the first GMTK Jam.

You've been transported to a strange dimension to destroy the evil Dr. Pluto. By your side is your trusty Swing Fist, a versatile tool that can not only be used to propel yourself, but to also kill enemies and gain speed. If you keep your momentum going, your speed level will increase, and you'll be able to run faster and jump higher! You're going to need it, because if your speed level hits zero, you're dead! Good Luck!

WASD for movement

Mouse for aiming and using grappling hook.

Hold the left mouse button to grapple and release to let go.

Engine used: Game Maker Studio 1.4

Audio and SFX: Famitracker
